channel.title: Global Exchange - Currency Updates
channel.description: Get the latest currency exchange rates, currency news, and market updates from Global Exchange.

item.title: Major Currency Update: USD Strengthens Against EUR and GBP
item.description: The US Dollar strengthened against major currencies following the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision. EUR/USD dropped to 1.08, while GBP/USD fell to 1.25.

item.title: Currency Volatility Expected with Upcoming Economic Data
item.description: Currency markets are bracing for increased volatility with several key economic indicators scheduled for release this week, including inflation data and central bank announcements.

item.title: New Guide: Understanding Currency Correlation in Your Portfolio
item.description: Our new comprehensive guide explains how currency correlations affect investment portfolios and how to use this knowledge to better manage risk.

item.title: Global Exchange Adds Support for 10 New Currencies
item.description: We've expanded our coverage to include 10 additional currencies, including the Moroccan Dirham (MAD), Kazakhstani Tenge (KZT), and Uruguayan Peso (UYU).

item.title: Historical Analysis: How Major Economic Events Affected Currency Values
item.description: Our analysis examines how significant economic events over the past decade have influenced major currency pairs, with insights for investors and traders.
